hero.title: The hidden luxury
hero.subtitle: A sanctuary of peace and warmth, far from everything and close to yourself.
hero.cabanaLimit: Max. 3 cabanas available online. Contact us for larger groups.

intro.title: Where silence, nature and soul come together
intro.subtitle: Just 20 minutes from Paramaribo lies Sendang Redjo — a serene retreat at a private lake, built on historic ground and guided by Javanese hospitality. Here, everything slows down, and silence finds its shape.

cabanas.title: Cabanas
cabanas.subtitle1: Our cabanas are your private space by the water — accessible only by boat, so you arrive in complete tranquility from the very first moment.
cabanas.subtitle2: Each cabana features a luxury outdoor lounge, a private kitchen with bar, poolbeds, a hammock, and a modern bathroom with hot shower and toilet. Kayaks, fishing rods and floaties are ready for you — whether you want to explore the lake or simply drift in silence.

dining.title: Dining
dining.subtitle1: Taste the Javanese kitchen in the heart of nature: slow-cooked over woodfire, seasoned with authentic spices and served in your own cabana — a culinary experience where flavor and peace come together.
dining.subtitle2: Dining is fully included with your stay. While you relax by the water, you prepare your own lunch on the grill and enjoy an atmosphere where time seems to stand still. Everything we serve is fresh, honest and prepared with care — the flavors and scents of Java complete your day retreat.

activiteiten.title: Activities
activiteiten.subtitle1: Explore the lake in complete peace: kayak at your own pace, fish in quiet spots or float effortlessly in the water. Relax in your cabana — in your hammock, surrounded by nothing but wind and birds.
activiteiten.subtitle2: And for nature lovers: from kingfishers to herons, every day is different.

invite.title: The hidden luxury of Sendang Redjo
invite.subtitle: At Sendang Redjo you experience a unique blend of peace, nature and warm Javanese hospitality. Everything is designed to immerse you completely in relaxation and sensory experience.
invite.subtitle1text: Designed with Javanese elegance—warm details, soft comforts and a panoramic view of the lake.
invite.subtitle2text: No rush, no crowds—just nature, silence and the feeling that time flows differently here.
invite.subtitle3text: Glide silently over the water, catch your own fish or drift away in total relaxation.
invite.subtitle4text: Slow-cooked over woodfire—pure flavors, warm aromas and tradition in its most beautiful form.

reviews.title: What guests take home from Sendang Redjo
reviews.subtitle: A day at the lake feels longer here than anywhere else. This is what guests remember most after their stay.

1.name: Auke Klene
1.text: On November 14 we visited your resort with a group of six. It was beautiful. We were welcomed with coconut water and an introduction, followed by a pleasant boat ride to our cabana. The cabana had everything we needed, and we had a great time. The BBQ was fantastic! And the return trip at dusk was breathtaking with the birds we saw on the way. Wishing you a wonderful future with many guests. Warm regards,

2.name: Edme Smith
2.text: What a magical place! Usually when going out near Paramaribo, there’s always a chance of loud music and noise. Not at Sendang Redjo: it feels like you're alone in the world, and you return refreshed instead of overstimulated. A true hidden gem of serene beauty! The cabana had everything we needed, the food was delicious, the service was excellent, and everyone enjoyed swimming, kayaking and real quality time. Thank you again — Sendang Redjo is definitely a place we will return to!

3.name: Sara Pawironadi
3.text: We had an amazing experience at Sendang Redjo — truly unique. Surrounded by nature, we saw a rainbow above us and birds gliding peacefully through the sky. The whole resort felt deeply serene, romantic and full of adventure. It’s the kind of place that touches your soul and makes you feel one with nature. Highly recommended for anyone seeking peace, serenity and a private escape in nature.

reviews.cta: Let these experiences inspire you even more.

cta.title: Ready for your day at the lake?
cta.subtitle: Whether you come to escape or simply to breathe—your cabana is waiting for you. We welcome you with open arms, a prepared table and a calm lake.
cta.highlightText: Just 20 minutes from Paramaribo, you step into a world of silence, water and Javanese hospitality. A hidden luxury for those who consciously choose peace.

footer.whatsappOnly: This number can only be reached via WhatsApp.

cabanasPage.text1: Experience the perfect balance between peace, comfort and nature in our exclusive cabanas. Designed to blend seamlessly with the environment — offering full privacy, lake views and the luxury of doing absolutely nothing.
cabanasPage.text2: Our cabanas are your private space by the water: a stylish day retreat where you can relax, swim, enjoy and spend time together. Each cabana lies directly at the lake and is equipped with everything you need for a carefree day.
cabanasPage.text3: The atmosphere is warm, spacious and in full harmony with nature — your place to truly unwind. Each cabana includes:

text3Subs.sub1: A comfortable outdoor lounge set with soft cushions
text3Subs.sub3: A solid wooden bar with stools
text3Subs.sub4: Space to dine, relax or simply enjoy the silence

cabanasPage.headTitle4: Experience our luxury cabanas by the water
cabanasPage.text4: At Sendang Redjo, each meal is part of the experience: authentic Javanese, slow-cooked over woodfire. Included in your day retreat:

text4Subs.point3: Soft drinks and juice in the fridge
text4Subs.point4: Javanese BBQ lunch with a marinated whole chicken and various satays you grill yourself in your cabana

cabanasPage.text5a: Step straight into the lake from your cabana — the water is literally at your feet. Kayaks, fishing rods and floaties are ready, letting you choose between an active moment or peaceful drifting. On the deck you’ll find comfortable poolbeds, ideal for sunbathing or dreaming away to the sounds of nature.
cabanasPage.text6: Each cabana is designed as your private sanctuary: calm, spacious and surrounded entirely by nature. Here, the rhythm is yours — and yours alone. You have access to:

text6Subs.sub2: A luxury bathroom with shower and toilet
text6Subs.sub4: All the space and privacy you need to experience the day in complete tranquility

diningPage.text1: Fresh, flavorful and prepared with care… a culinary experience that finds peace in the silence of nature.
diningPage.text2: Dining at Sendang Redjo isn’t a separate activity — it's part of the experience. Our kitchen is homely, Javanese-inspired and entirely freshly prepared.
diningPage.subtext2a: Every reservation is fully catered. You don’t need to order anything extra (you can, of course). Upon arrival you’ll receive:

features.freshDrinks: Soft drinks, juice, water & ice in your fridge

features2.dinner: A light dinner / late afternoon BBQ

diningPage.text3: Around midday we deliver a warm, fully prepared lunch to your cabana. Choose from two traditional dishes:

text3Subs.sub1text: Chicken (halal) stewed in coconut milk — soft, creamy and rich in Javanese spices.
text3Subs.sub2text: Marinated seawater fish prepared with authentic herbs for a deep and savory flavor.
text3Subs.sub3text: Seghoh Ghoerih — our Javanese rice dish, accompanied by vegetables and side dishes.
text3Subs.sub4text: You’ll also receive a portion of homemade chips — perfect while swimming or relaxing.

diningPage.text4: Later in the afternoon you’ll receive a carefully prepared BBQ set, ready to grill by the water — a moment many guests look forward to.

subtitle4aSubs.sub1text: Chicken satay from tender thigh meat (halal), marinated the Javanese way.

subtitle4bSubs.sub2title: OR — Marinated seawater fish instead of Sateh Sapi
subtitle4bSubs.sub2text: Seasoned, wrapped in foil and slowly cooked over the grill.

diningPage.text4End: Grilling, the view and the silence make this BBQ a beautifully serene moment of the day.
diningPage.text5: For those who love fishing, we offer a unique extra experience:
diningPage.text5sub: Catch a tukunari (Surinamese peacock bass) from the private lake. We clean it, season it and prepare it for you. A pure, rare experience in the heart of Tamanredjo.

extras.sectionSubtitle: For guests who want to enrich their dining experience with extra dishes, drinks or personal preferences.
extras.textMeals: The day arrangement is generous, but for guests wanting something more, we prepare warm traditional dishes on request.

meals.meal1Title: Saoto soup with egg — A Javanese-Surinamese classic: fragrant chicken broth with bean sprouts, fried onions, celery and a boiled egg.
meals.meal2Title: Djangan Bening — A light Javanese vegetable soup in clear broth. Served with trie (crispy fried fish) or fried bony fish.

extras.mealsEnd: Other Javanese dishes can be offered upon request.
extras.textDrinks: Not included, but available upon request: beer, wine and spirits.
extras.textDiets: Vegetarian, pescatarian or specific preferences? Let us know in advance. We gladly adapt your dining experience so it perfectly matches your wishes.

activiteitenPage.text1: Discover peace, adventure and connection with nature: kayak, fish, float and observe birds in the serene surroundings of Sendang Redjo.
activiteitenPage.text2: Choose how you spend your day — active on the water or relaxed in your cabana. Everything revolves around nature, tranquility and your own rhythm.
activiteitenPage.headAct: Experience nature in your own way
activiteitenPage.text3: Glide silently across the water, with no other guests around. The lake is yours — perfect for moments of peace, freedom and connection with nature.
activiteitenPage.text4: With a simple rod and all the time in the world, enjoy complete silence. Whether you catch something or not, the scenery and tranquility make every moment meaningful.
activiteitenPage.text5: Let the warm water carry you and fully unwind. Float, swim or simply drift — a weightless experience you won’t find anywhere else.
activiteitenPage.text6: Experience the warm, sincere hospitality that defines Javanese culture. Here, attention, calmness and connection become part of your day.

about.title1: Born from a dream. Carried by nature.
about.text1: Sendang Redjo is not a hotel. It is a sanctuary — a place where simplicity, nature and soul flow together.
about.text2a: Sendang Redjo lies on historic ground in Tamanredjo (Commewijne), where the former plantation La Paix once stood. In this quiet green valley, a new ecosystem is taking shape: young forests, creeks, palms and lakes form a living landscape that grows richer every day.
about.text2b: Here, you hear dozens of bird species sing, see small monkeys jumping through the branches, otters play in the water and tukunari dart beneath the surface. This is not a backdrop — this is nature as it was meant to be.
about.title3: Cabanas that blend into the landscape
about.text3a: Our wooden cabanas are fully open-designed. You breathe nature, hear it, feel it — the boundary between inside and outside fades.
about.text3b: No walls closing you off. No artificial distractions. Only space to slow down and be fully present.
about.text4a: Sendang Redjo — “Source of prosperity”. A name chosen with care. Not as a brand, but as a destination.
about.text4b: Sendang Redjo comes from Old Javanese and carries multiple layers of meaning — spiritual, cultural and geographical.
about.text4c: In ancient Java, a sendang referred to a natural spring: quiet places in nature where people bathed, meditated or sought protection. These springs were sacred, linked to rituals, old kingdoms like Majapahit and legends of penunggu — guardians of the land.
about.text4d: Redjo means prosperity, harmony and balance. It also lovingly refers to Tamanredjo — the Javanese-Surinamese village where this eco retreat was created.
about.text5a: Because Sendang Redjo is more than a beautiful place. It is a consciously designed sanctuary where nature, simplicity and hospitality come together.
about.text5b: There is no rush, no program, no mass tourism — only space to recharge, slow down and reconnect with what truly matters.

enroute.title: Accessibility & directions
enroute.entranceText: After the sign ‘Tamanredjo’, immediately take the first left. This is the same turn as shown in the photo. The entrance to Sendang Redjo is only 400 meters further.
enroute.mapText: Follow the East-West Highway toward Tamanredjo. The map below guides you straight to our location.
enroute.qrCodeText: Scan the QR code or use the location link below to open our Google Maps location directly.

whatsapp.title: WhatsApp
whatsapp.subtitle: Have a question or want to reserve? Send us a WhatsApp message — we respond quickly.

reserverenPage.introTitle: Your day at Sendang Redjo begins here
reserverenPage.introText: Sendang Redjo is an exclusive eco retreat where peace, nature and personal attention come first. We host only a limited number of guests per day to ensure your experience remains quiet, personal and uninterrupted. For that reason, reservations are required.
reserverenPage.contactSubtitle: Reservations can be made via WhatsApp or email. We respond quickly and are happy to assist.
inclusief: Personal welcome and boat transfer to your private cabana
Freshly fried spring rolls and a chilled coconut on arrival
Private cabana with lounge, bar, water terrace, poolbeds and private bathroom
Coffee and tea in the cabana
Soft drinks, water and juice in the fridge
Free use of kayaks, life vests, floaties and fishing rods
Access to the lake and creeks of the sanctuary
Personal guidance upon arrival and departure
nietInbegrepen: Catch & Cook with your own caught fish
reserverenPage.huisregelsText: Before departure to your cabana, we ask all guests to read and sign the document.
belangrijk: Arrival time must be reserved in advance
We are not reachable by phone
Always use the route instructions from your confirmation
